name: ansi-escape-code
description: Effortless ANSI styling with nesting support

scripts.build: rimraf dist && rollup -c && cpy npm.md dist --rename=README.md && package-json-minifier
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.doctest: npm run build && npm --prefix packages/parser run build && npm --prefix packages/type run build && jsdoctest dist/*.js packages/*/dist/*.js
